Name: The Shawshank Redemption
Descrition: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.

Name: The Godfather
Descrition: The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty in postwar New York City transfers control of his clandestine empire to his reluctant youngest son.

Name: Rocketry: The Nambi Effect
Descrition: Based on the life of Indian Space Research Organization scientist Nambi Narayanan, who was framed for being a spy and arrested in 1994. Though free, he continues to fight for justice against the officials who falsely implicated him.

Name: The Dark Knight
Descrition: When the menace known as the Joker wreaks havoc and chaos on the people of Gotham, Batman must accept one of the greatest psychological and physical tests of his ability to fight injustice.

Name: The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King
Descrition: Gandalf and Aragorn lead the World of Men against Sauron's army to draw his gaze from Frodo and Sam as they approach Mount Doom with the One Ring.

Name: Schindler's List
Descrition: In German-occupied Poland during World War II, industrialist Oskar Schindler gradually becomes concerned for his Jewish workforce after witnessing their persecution by the Nazis.

Name: The Godfather Part II
Descrition: The early life and career of Vito Corleone in 1920s New York City is portrayed, while his son, Michael, expands and tightens his grip on the family crime syndicate.

Name: 12 Angry Men
Descrition: The jury in a New York City murder trial is frustrated by a single member whose skeptical caution forces them to more carefully consider the evidence before jumping to a hasty verdict.

Name: Jai Bhim
Descrition: When a tribal man is arrested for a case of alleged theft, his wife turns to a human-rights lawyer to help bring justice.

Name: Pulp Fiction
Descrition: The lives of two mob hitmen, a boxer, a gangster and his wife, and a pair of diner bandits intertwine in four tales of violence and redemption.

Name: Inception
Descrition: A thief who steals corporate secrets through the use of dream-sharing technology is given the inverse task of planting an idea into the mind of a C.E.O., but his tragic past may doom the project and his team to disaster.

Name: The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers
Descrition: While Frodo and Sam edge closer to Mordor with the help of the shifty Gollum, the divided fellowship makes a stand against Sauron's new ally, Saruman, and his hordes of Isengard.

Name: Fight Club
Descrition: An insomniac office worker and a devil-may-care soap maker form an underground fight club that evolves into much more.

Name: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
Descrition: A meek Hobbit from the Shire and eight companions set out on a journey to destroy the powerful One Ring and save Middle-earth from the Dark Lord Sauron.

Name: Forrest Gump
Descrition: The presidencies of Kennedy and Johnson, the Vietnam War, the Watergate scandal and other historical events unfold from the perspective of an Alabama man with an IQ of 75, whose only desire is to be reunited with his childhood sweetheart.

Name: Il buono, il brutto, il cattivo
Descrition: A bounty hunting scam joins two men in an uneasy alliance against a third in a race to find a fortune in gold buried in a remote cemetery.

Name: Soorarai Pottru
Descrition: Nedumaaran Rajangam "Maara" sets out to make the common man fly and in the process takes on the world's most capital intensive industry and several enemies who stand in his way.

Name: The Matrix
Descrition: When a beautiful stranger leads computer hacker Neo to a forbidding underworld, he discovers the shocking truth--the life he knows is the elaborate deception of an evil cyber-intelligence.

Name: Goodfellas
Descrition: The story of Henry Hill and his life in the mob, covering his relationship with his wife Karen Hill and his mob partners Jimmy Conway and Tommy DeVito in the Italian-American crime syndicate.

Name: The Empire Strikes Back
Descrition: After the Rebels are brutally overpowered by the Empire on the ice planet Hoth, Luke Skywalker begins Jedi training with Yoda, while his friends are pursued across the galaxy by Darth Vader and bounty hunter Boba Fett.

Name: One Flew Over the Cuckoo's Nest
Descrition: In the Fall of 1963, a Korean War veteran and criminal pleads insanity and is admitted to a mental institution, where he rallies up the scared patients against the tyrannical nurse.

Name: Interstellar
Descrition: A team of explorers travel through a wormhole in space in an attempt to ensure humanity's survival.

Name: Cidade de Deus
Descrition: In the slums of Rio, two kids' paths diverge as one struggles to become a photographer and the other a kingpin.

Name: Sen to Chihiro no kamikakushi
Descrition: During her family's move to the suburbs, a sullen 10-year-old girl wanders into a world ruled by gods, witches, and spirits, and where humans are changed into beasts.

Name: Saving Private Ryan
Descrition: Following the Normandy Landings, a group of U.S. soldiers go behind enemy lines to retrieve a paratrooper whose brothers have been killed in action.

Name: The Green Mile
Descrition: The lives of guards on Death Row are affected by one of their charges: a black man accused of child murder and rape, yet who has a mysterious gift.

Name: La vita è bella
Descrition: When an open-minded Jewish waiter and his son become victims of the Holocaust, he uses a perfect mixture of will, humor, and imagination to protect his son from the dangers around their camp.

Name: Se7en
Descrition: Two detectives, a rookie and a veteran, hunt a serial killer who uses the seven deadly sins as his motives.

Name: Terminator 2: Judgment Day
Descrition: A cyborg, identical to the one who failed to kill Sarah Connor, must now protect her ten-year-old son John from a more advanced and powerful cyborg.

Name: The Silence of the Lambs
Descrition: A young F.B.I. cadet must receive the help of an incarcerated and manipulative cannibal killer to help catch another serial killer, a madman who skins his victims.

Name: Star Wars
Descrition: Luke Skywalker joins forces with a Jedi Knight, a cocky pilot, a Wookiee and two droids to save the galaxy from the Empire's world-destroying battle station, while also attempting to rescue Princess Leia from the mysterious Darth Vader.

Name: Seppuku
Descrition: When a ronin requesting seppuku at a feudal lord's palace is told of the brutal suicide of another ronin who previously visited, he reveals how their pasts are intertwined - and in doing so challenges the clan's integrity.

Name: Shichinin no samurai
Descrition: Farmers from a village exploited by bandits hire a veteran samurai for protection, who gathers six other samurai to join him. As the samurai teach the peasants how to defend themselves, the village is attacked by an army of bandits.

Name: It's a Wonderful Life
Descrition: An angel is sent from Heaven to help a desperately frustrated businessman by showing him what life would have been like if he had never existed.

Name: Kaithi
Descrition: Dilli, an ex-convict, endeavours to meet his daughter for the first time after leaving prison. However, his attempts are interrupted due to a drug raid planned by Inspector Bejoy.

Name: Asuran
Descrition: The teenage son of a farmer from an underprivileged caste kills a rich, upper caste landlord. Will the farmer, a loving father and a pacifist by heart, be able to save his hot-blooded son is the rest of the story.
Two high school sweethearts meet at a reunion after 22 years and reminisce about their past.

Name: Gisaengchung
Descrition: Greed and class discrimination threaten the newly formed symbiotic relationship between the wealthy Park family and the destitute Kim clan.

Name: Whiplash
Descrition: A promising young drummer enrolls at a cut-throat music conservatory where his dreams of greatness are mentored by an instructor who will stop at nothing to realize a student's potential.

Name: Top Gun: Maverick
Descrition: After thirty years, Maverick is still pushing the envelope as a top naval aviator, but must confront ghosts of his past when he leads TOP GUN's elite graduates on a mission that demands the ultimate sacrifice from those chosen to fly it.

Name: The Intouchables
Descrition: After he becomes a quadriplegic from a paragliding accident, an aristocrat hires a young man from the projects to be his caregiver.

Name: The Prestige
Descrition: After a tragic accident, two stage magicians in 1890s London engage in a battle to create the ultimate illusion while sacrificing everything they have to outwit each other.

Name: The Departed
Descrition: An undercover cop and a mole in the police attempt to identify each other while infiltrating an Irish gang in South Boston.

Name: The Pianist
Descrition: A Polish Jewish musician struggles to survive the destruction of the Warsaw ghetto of World War II.

Name: Gladiator
Descrition: A former Roman General sets out to exact vengeance against the corrupt emperor who murdered his family and sent him into slavery.

Name: American History X
Descrition: A former neo-nazi skinhead tries to prevent his younger brother from going down the same wrong path that he did.

Name: The Usual Suspects
Descrition: A sole survivor tells of the twisty events leading up to a horrific gun battle on a boat, which began when five criminals met at a seemingly random police lineup.

Name: Léon
Descrition: 12-year-old Mathilda is reluctantly taken in by Léon, a professional assassin, after her family is murdered. An unusual relationship forms as she becomes his protégée and learns the assassin's trade.

Name: The Lion King
Descrition: Lion prince Simba and his father are targeted by his bitter uncle, who wants to ascend the throne himself.

Name: Nuovo Cinema Paradiso
Descrition: A filmmaker recalls his childhood when falling in love with the pictures at the cinema of his home village and forms a deep friendship with the cinema's projectionist.

Name: Hotaru no haka
Descrition: A young boy and his little sister struggle to survive in Japan during World War II.

Name: Back to the Future
Descrition: Marty McFly, a 17-year-old high school student, is accidentally sent 30 years into the past in a time-traveling DeLorean invented by his close friend, the maverick scientist Doc Brown.

Name: Apocalypse Now
Descrition: A U.S. Army officer serving in Vietnam is tasked with assassinating a renegade Special Forces Colonel who sees himself as a god.

Name: Alien
Descrition: The crew of a commercial spacecraft encounter a deadly lifeform after investigating an unknown transmission.

Name: Once Upon a Time in the West
Descrition: A mysterious stranger with a harmonica joins forces with a notorious desperado to protect a beautiful widow from a ruthless assassin working for the railroad.

Name: Psycho
Descrition: A Phoenix secretary embezzles $40,000 from her employer's client, goes on the run, and checks into a remote motel run by a young man under the domination of his mother.

Name: Rear Window
Descrition: A wheelchair-bound photographer spies on his neighbors from his Greenwich Village courtyard apartment window, and becomes convinced one of them has committed murder, despite the skepticism of his fashion-model girlfriend.

Name: Casablanca
Descrition: A cynical expatriate American cafe owner struggles to decide whether or not to help his former lover and her fugitive husband escape the Nazis in French Morocco.

Name: Modern Times
Descrition: The Tramp struggles to live in modern industrial society with the help of a young homeless woman.

Name: City Lights
Descrition: With the aid of a wealthy erratic tippler, a dewy-eyed tramp who has fallen in love with a sightless flower girl accumulates money to be able to help her medically.

Name: Vikram
Descrition: A high-octane action film where a special investigator is assigned a case of serial Killings, he finds the case is not what it seems to be and leading down this path is only going to end in a war between everyone involved.

Name: Capharnaüm
Descrition: While serving a five-year sentence for a violent crime, a 12-year-old boy sues his parents for neglect.
Cast: ['Zain Al Rafeea', 'Yordanos Shiferaw', 'Boluwatife Treasure Bankole', 'Kawsar Al Haddad']

Name: Joker
Descrition: A mentally troubled stand-up comedian embarks on a downward spiral that leads to the creation of an iconic villain.

Name: Kimi no na wa.
Descrition: Two strangers find themselves linked in a bizarre way. When a connection forms, will distance be the only thing to keep them apart?

Name: Spider-Man: Into the Spider-Verse
Descrition: Teen Miles Morales becomes the Spider-Man of his universe, and must join with five spider-powered individuals from other dimensions to stop a threat for all realities.
Directors: Directors:Bob Persichetti, Peter Ramsey, Rodney Rothman

Name: Avengers: Endgame
Descrition: After the devastating events of Avengers: Infinity War (2018), the universe is in ruins. With the help of remaining allies, the Avengers assemble once more in order to reverse Thanos' actions and restore balance to the universe.

Name: Avengers: Infinity War
Descrition: The Avengers and their allies must be willing to sacrifice all in an attempt to defeat the powerful Thanos before his blitz of devastation and ruin puts an end to the universe.

Name: Coco
Descrition: Aspiring musician Miguel, confronted with his family's ancestral ban on music, enters the Land of the Dead to find his great-great-grandfather, a legendary singer.

Name: Django Unchained
Descrition: With the help of a German bounty-hunter, a freed slave sets out to rescue his wife from a brutal plantation-owner in Mississippi.

Name: The Dark Knight Rises
Descrition: Eight years after the Joker's reign of anarchy, Batman, with the help of the enigmatic Catwoman, is forced from his exile to save Gotham City from the brutal guerrilla terrorist Bane.

Name: Drishyam 2
Descrition: A gripping tale of an investigation and a family which is threatened by it. Will Georgekutty be able to protect his family this time?

Name: 3 Idiots
Descrition: Two friends are searching for their long lost companion. They revisit their college days and recall the memories of their friend who inspired them to think differently, even as the rest of the world called them "idiots".

Name: K.G.F: Chapter 2
Descrition: In the blood-soaked Kolar Gold Fields, Rocky's name strikes fear into his foes. While his allies look up to him, the government sees him as a threat to law and order. Rocky must battle threats from all sides for unchallenged supremacy.

Name: Shershaah
Descrition: Shershaah is the story of PVC awardee Indian soldier Capt. Vikram Batra, whose bravery and unflinching courage in chasing the Pakistani soldiers out of Indian territory contributed immensely in India finally winning the Kargil War in 1999.

Name: Sardar Udham
Descrition: A biopic detailing the 2 decades that Punjabi Sikh revolutionary Udham Singh spent planning the assassination of the man responsible for the Jallianwala Bagh massacre.

Name: WALL·E
Descrition: In the distant future, a small waste-collecting robot inadvertently embarks on a space journey that will ultimately decide the fate of mankind.

Name: The Lives of Others
Descrition: In 1984 East Berlin, an agent of the secret police, conducting surveillance on a writer and his lover, finds himself becoming increasingly absorbed by their lives.

Name: Oldeuboi
Descrition: After being kidnapped and imprisoned for fifteen years, Oh Dae-Su is released, only to find that he must find his captor in five days.

Name: Memento
Descrition: A man with short-term memory loss attempts to track down his wife's murderer.

Name: American Beauty
Descrition: A sexually frustrated suburban father has a mid-life crisis after becoming infatuated with his daughter's best friend.

Name: Mononoke-hime
Descrition: On a journey to find the cure for a Tatarigami's curse, Ashitaka finds himself in the middle of a war between the forest gods and Tatara, a mining colony. In this quest he also meets San, the Mononoke Hime.

Name: Braveheart
Descrition: Scottish warrior William Wallace leads his countrymen in a rebellion to free his homeland from the tyranny of King Edward I of England.

Name: Idi i smotri
Descrition: After finding an old rifle, a young boy joins the Soviet resistance movement against ruthless German forces and experiences the horrors of World War II.

Name: Aliens
Descrition: Fifty-seven years after surviving an apocalyptic attack aboard her space vessel by merciless space creatures, Officer Ripley awakens from hyper-sleep and tries to warn anyone who will listen about the predators.

Name: Amadeus
Descrition: The life, success and troubles of Wolfgang Amadeus Mozart, as told by Antonio Salieri, the contemporaneous composer who was insanely jealous of Mozart's talent and claimed to have murdered him.

Name: Raiders of the Lost Ark
Descrition: Archaeology professor Indiana Jones ventures to seize a biblical artefact known as the Ark of the Covenant. While doing so, he puts up a fight against Renee and a troop of Nazis.

Name: Das Boot
Descrition: The claustrophobic world of a WWII German U-boat; boredom, filth and sheer terror.

Name: The Shining
Descrition: A family heads to an isolated hotel for the winter where a sinister presence influences the father into violence, while his psychic son sees horrific forebodings from both past and future.

Name: Tengoku to jigoku
Descrition: An executive of a Yokohama shoe company becomes a victim of extortion when his chauffeur's son is kidnapped by mistake and held for ransom.

Name: Dr. Strangelove or: How I Learned to Stop Worrying and Love the Bomb
Descrition: An insane American general orders a bombing attack on the Soviet Union, triggering a path to nuclear holocaust that a war room full of politicians and generals frantically tries to stop.

Name: Witness for the Prosecution
Descrition: A veteran British barrister must defend his client in a murder trial that has surprise after surprise.

Name: Paths of Glory
Descrition: After refusing to attack an enemy position, a general accuses the soldiers of cowardice and their commanding officer must defend them.

Name: Sunset Blvd.
Descrition: A screenwriter develops a dangerous relationship with a faded film star determined to make a triumphant return.

Name: The Great Dictator
Descrition: Dictator Adenoid Hynkel tries to expand his empire while a poor Jewish barber tries to avoid persecution from Hynkel's regime.

Name: Chhichhore
Descrition: A tragic incident forces Anirudh, a middle-aged man, to take a trip down memory lane and reminisce his college days along with his friends, who were labelled as losers.

Name: Hamilton
Descrition: The real life of one of America's foremost founding fathers and first Secretary of the Treasury, Alexander Hamilton. Captured live on Broadway from the Richard Rodgers Theater with the original Broadway cast.
Cast: ['Lin-Manuel Miranda', 'Phillipa Soo', 'Leslie Odom Jr.', 'Renée Elise Goldsberry']

Name: Ratsasan
Descrition: A sub-inspector sets out in pursuit of a mysterious serial killer who targets teen school girls and murders them brutally.

Name: Ayla: The Daughter of War
Descrition: In 1950, amid-st the ravages of the Korean War, Sergeant Süleyman stumbles upon a half-frozen little girl, with no parents and no help in sight. Frantic, scared and on the verge of death, ...                See full summary »

Name: Vikram Vedha
Descrition: Vikram, a no-nonsense police officer, accompanied by Simon, his partner, is on the hunt to capture Vedha, a smuggler and a murderer. Vedha tries to change Vikram's life, which leads to a conflict.

Name: Dangal
Descrition: Former wrestler Mahavir Singh Phogat and his two wrestler daughters struggle towards glory at the Commonwealth Games in the face of societal oppression.
